question: [Study] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (104, 104), (142, 151), (119, 161).

qas.question: [Study] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (104, 104), (142, 151), (119, 161).
[Check] Norsk: Finn areal og omkrets for trekanten med punktene (104, 104), (142, 151), (119, 161). Provide only the area.
[Challenge] Nederlands: Bepaal oppervlakte en omtrek van de driehoek met punten (104, 104), (142, 151), (119, 161). Provide only the perimeter.
